text: But three years later, two of Shimei's servants ran away to Achish, son of Maacah, king of Gath, and Shimei was told, “Your servants are in Gath.”
Azariah became the father of Helez. Helez became the father of Eleasah.
descendants of Harim, one thousand and seventeen.
When Mattathias and his friends heard of it, they mourned deeply for them.
Another kingdom shall take your place, inferior to yours, then a third kingdom, of bronze, which shall rule over the whole earth.
The Return to Nazareth. When they had fulfilled all the prescriptions of the law of the Lord, they returned to Galilee, to their own town of Nazareth.
For the promise is made to you and to your children and to all those far off, whomever the Lord our God will call.”
